gear_tradeoffs.pros: Maximizes turn cycling and buff uptime
gear_tradeoffs.cons: Lower survivability if not paired with HP/DEF sets

gear_tradeoffs.pros: Self-sustain for Clan Boss and dungeons

overview.best_dungeon_use: Fire Knight, Dragon, Minotaur, Spider, Ice Golem

a1.name: Scatterbolt
a1.notes: Attacks 3 times at random. Good for Fire Knight shield and Giant Slayer procs.

a2.name: Soothing Chant
a2.notes: Heals a target ally by 35% of their MAX HP. This heal can be critical.

a3.name: Boon of Speed
a3.notes: Places a 30% Increase Speed buff on all allies for 2 turns. Fills Turn Meter of all allies by 15%.

booking.notes: Books reduce cooldowns and increase healing on A2. A3 cooldown is critical for speed teams.

scenarios.notes: Triple hit A1 maximizes Giant Slayer procs.
Focus on speed and buff extension, not damage.
Useful for Fire Knight and general support.

clan_boss.damage_per_turn: Low (support role, not main damage dealer)
clan_boss.notes: Provides speed, healing, and turn meter fill. Triple hit A1 for Giant Slayer.

synergy.relentless_viability: Viable for more frequent buffs and healing, but can cause rotation desync.

investment.notes: Apothecary is one of the best rare supports for all content. High ROI for early and mid-game accounts.

owned_comparison.comparison: Better aura, less healing. Both are strong speed boosters.

draft_logic.notes: Apothecary is a strong early pick for speed and healing. Counter-pick against slow or debuff-heavy teams.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: Can reduce cooldowns for more frequent buffs/heals.
gear_set_stability.Relentless: More turns, but can desync skill rotation.

rotation_desync_risks.Relentless: Moderate risk, can throw off skill order.

utility_comparison.comparison: Better aura, less healing. Both are strong speed boosters.

ratings.relentless_viability: B (can be useful, but not always optimal)

final_summary.damage_rotation: Low, main value is speed, healing, and support
final_summary.turn_meter_stability: Stable with Speed/Immortal; Relentless can desync
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize SPD, HP%, DEF%, C.RATE for best results
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Pairs well with other speed boosters and revivers
final_summary.draft_value: High for speed and sustain teams

team_setups.name: Speed Boost Arena Team
team_setups.strategy: Maximize speed, turn meter, and AoE damage.

team_setups.name: Dungeon Sustain Team
team_setups.strategy: Sustain and speed for safe dungeon clears.
